description: Considering “Conway's Law” as an axiom, I aim to consider several aspects of how the organizational communication structure effects software design. Rapid changes within cross-timezones organizations influence software architecture processes. What can engineers or architects do to guarantee a productive and quality assuring design and implementation process, that foresees ongoing organizational changes. Organizational changes are another requirement of the design and implementations of software system.
title: Dealing with "Conway law" /
